miic3.utils.datatype.Header¶

class miic3.utils.datatype.Header(dimension='', symbol='', name='', unit=<miic3.utils.datatype.Unit object>)[source]¶

Description of meta information of a physical quantity

Parameters

  • dimension (str) – physical dimension of the quantity

  • symbol (str) – symbol of the quantity

  • name (str) – name of the quantity

  • unit (Unit) – unit of the quantity

Supported Operations

header = headerA + headerB

Raises an error if headers do not match. See also Header.__add__() and Header.__sub__().

header = headerA * headerB

Returns the procuct of two Headers. See also Header.__mul__() and Header.__truediv__().

header = headerA**N

Returns the power of a header for an interger N. See also Header.__pow__().

str(Header)

Returns a string representation of the header.

__init__(dimension='', symbol='', name='', unit=<miic3.utils.datatype.Unit object>)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Methods

__init__([dimension, symbol, name, unit])

Initialize self.

copy()

Return an copy of the object

load(filename)

Load an unit object from a numpy npz file.

save(filename)

Save the object in a numpy npz file
